sentences.en: A carp splashed in the pond.
sentences.cn: 池子里的红鲤鱼泼剌一响.

sentences.en: He cannot understand why she's constantly carping at him.
sentences.cn: 他不理解为什么她对他总是百般的挑剔。

sentences.en: His eyes followed restlessly one of the golden carp that darted from lily to lily.
sentences.cn: 他目不转睛地盯着在荷花间嬉戏的一尾金色鲤鱼.

sentences.en: I like the white carp most.
It would be wise not to carp or criticize.
sentences.cn: 不吹毛求疵或批评将是明智的.

sentences.en: Now he's dead; nothing carp bring him hack.
sentences.cn: 现在他已经死了, 随便什么也不可能把他的魂招回来了.

sentences.en: One of the golden carp darted from lily to lily.
sentences.cn: 一尾金色鲤鱼在荷花间嬉戏.

sentences.en: She could lie on the cool rocks and play with the golden carp.
sentences.cn: 她会趴在凉爽的石板上,逗弄金鱼.

sentences.en: The pond contains a mixture of goldfish and carp.
sentences.cn: 池塘里混养着金鱼和鲤鱼.

sentences.en: They saw a little carp swimming swiftly in the stream.
sentences.cn: 他们看见一条小鲤鱼在河里迅速地游着.

sentences.en: This was the man whom other trainers love to carp about.
sentences.cn: 这就是老被其他教练挑毛病的那个人。

sentences.en: We will not carp at this great writer.
sentences.cn: 我们不会对这位伟大的作家吹毛求疵.

sentences.en: When he hauled it up there was a great carp at the end.
sentences.cn: 他把钓线拉上来时,钩上钓着了一条大鲤鱼.

sentences.en: Women and children carp afford to be careless, men cannot.
sentences.cn: 在于这类事情的时候要显出从容不迫的样子.

words.tran_cn: 挑毛病的；吹毛求疵的（副词carpingly）
苛评的人；吹毛求疵的人

trans.tran_cn: 鲤鱼，鲤科（包括金鱼或锦鲤）
trans.tran_en: a large fish that lives in lakes and rivers and can be eaten
to keep complaining about something in a way that is annoying
